info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
On clear days,
the night sky feels especially vast and pristine,
like a state of mind.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, human vitality,
Indeed resonates with fair and rainy weather,
It can be explained by air pressure, or shall we say, the energy field.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
...(sleepy) Oh, at this hour
I should be sleeping,
I'm only here because it's sunny today...
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
No commissions tonight,
No extreme weather either,
Just taking a quiet stroll while it's peaceful around here.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
An unexpected...{短暂停}<color=#695c3a>encounter,</color>
Indeed, when the sky is clear,
Good fortune follows.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Normally, {短暂停}following the pattern,
I should still be asleep, holding... {短暂停}"the weird head"!
Oh, it's nothing, never mind.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Actually, I've been trying to adjust my daily routine to adapt to life here.{短暂停}
But so far,{短暂停} it hasn't been very successful.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
You don't seem sleepy tonight,
You're especially energetic,
Like a clear sunny day.
